channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 比亚迪获得高速路自动驾驶3级有条件测试牌照
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD , said on Wednesday it has obtained a conditional testing license for level 3 (L3) autonomous driving on high-speed roads.翻译:中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪周三表示，已获得高速道路 3 级（L3）自动驾驶有条件测试许可证。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着选举临近，中国威胁对台湾实施更多贸易制裁
item.description: The Chinese government on Wednesday threatened to place further trade sanctions on Taiwan if the ruling party "stubbornly" adheres to supporting independence, in a further escalation of the war of words as Taiwanese elections approach next month.翻译:中国政府周三威胁称，如果执政党“顽固地”坚持支持独立，中国政府将对其实施进一步的贸易制裁，随着下个月台湾选举的临近，口水战将进一步升级。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 威士忌与煤矿“棚屋”：台湾选举不仅仅关乎中国
item.description: As Taiwan's election approaches next month, it is not only fraught ties with China competing for electors' attention.翻译:随着台湾下个月大选的临近，争夺选民注意力的不仅仅是与中国大陆的紧张关系。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 中国工业利润实现两位数增长但复苏不平衡
item.description: China's November industrial profits posted double-digit gains as overall manufacturing improved, although soft demand continued to constrain business growth expectations, emboldening calls for more macro policy support.翻译:尽管需求疲软继续限制企业增长预期，但随着整体制造业改善，中国 11 月份工业利润录得两位数增长，鼓励更多宏观政策支持。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉上海工厂将推出改款 Model Y - 彭博新闻
item.description: Electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc is preparing to launch a revamped version of its Model Y from its Shanghai plant, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，电动汽车制造商特斯拉公司正准备在其上海工厂推出改进版的 Model Y。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 加拿大准备向 2018 年在中国被监禁的两名男子支付和解金 - 报告
item.description: Canada's government is willing to sign off on multimillion-dollar settlement packages for Canadians Michael Spavor and Michael Kovrig to compensate them for the near three years they were incarcerated in Chinese prisons, the Globe and Mail reported on Tuesday, citing government sources.翻译:据《环球邮报》周二援引政府消息人士的话报道，加拿大政府愿意为加拿大人迈克尔·斯帕弗和迈克尔·康明凯签署数百万美元的和解方案，以补偿他们在中国监狱近三年的监禁。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国将部分中国商品的关税排除期限延长至5月31日
item.description: The office of U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Tuesday announced a further extension of China "Section 301" tariff exclusions on 352 Chinese import and 77 COVID-19-related categories till May 31, 2024.翻译:美国贸易代表凯瑟琳·戴办公室周二宣布，将中国对 352 种进口商品和 77 种与 COVID-19 相关的商品的“301 条款”关税排除进一步延长至 2024 年 5 月 31 日。
item.author: Kanishka Singh

item.title: 习近平誓言防止任何人“把台湾从中国分裂出去”
item.description: President Xi Jinping vowed on Tuesday to resolutely prevent anyone from "splitting Taiwan from China in any way", the official Xinhua news agency reported, a little more than two weeks before Taiwan elects a new leader.翻译:据官方新华社报道，距离台湾选举新领导人两周多一点，国家主席习近平周二誓言坚决阻止任何人“以任何方式将台湾从中国分裂出去”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾扩大对俄罗斯的制裁，以阻止技术被用于武器
item.description: Taiwan's economy ministry said on Tuesday it had expanded a list of sanctioned goods for Russia and its ally Belarus in response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine to prevent Taiwanese high-tech goods from being used for military purposes.翻译:台湾经济部周二表示，针对俄罗斯入侵乌克兰，扩大了对俄罗斯及其盟友白俄罗斯的制裁商品清单，以防止台湾高科技产品被用于军事目的。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国严厉打击数亿美元政府投资诈骗
item.description: Chinese police this year have cracked down on hundreds of millions of dollars of fraud cases using fabricated government documents to attract investment in fake national projects, state media reported on Tuesday.翻译:据官方媒体周二报道，中国警方今年破获了利用伪造政府文件吸引虚假国家项目投资的数亿美元诈骗案件。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 阿斯利康斥资12亿美元收购中国亘喜生物
item.description: AstraZeneca said on Tuesday it will buy Gracell Biotechnologies for up to $1.2 billion as the Anglo-Swedish pharma company furthers its cell therapy ambitions and boosts its presence in China, the world's second-largest pharmaceuticals market.翻译:阿斯利康周二表示，将以高达 12 亿美元的价格收购 Gracell Biotechnologies，这家英瑞制药公司将进一步推进其细胞治疗雄心，并增强其在全球第二大制药市场中国的业务。
item.author: Urvi Dugar, Christy Santhosh

item.title: 监管举措令投资者不安后，中国游戏公司宣布股票回购
item.description: A slew of smaller Chinese gaming companies have announced share buybacks - plans seen as an attempt to reassure investors after the market was spooked by regulatory moves to clamp down on consumer spending on games.翻译:许多规模较小的中国游戏公司宣布了股票回购计划，这些计划被视为在市场因打击消费者游戏支出的监管举措而受到惊吓后试图安抚投资者。
item.author: Li Gu, Casey Hall

item.title: 菲律宾军方称菲律宾并未挑起南海冲突
item.description: The Philippines is not provoking conflict in the South China Sea, its military spokesperson said on Tuesday, responding to China's accusation that Manila was encroaching on Beijing's territory.翻译:菲律宾军方发言人周二表示，菲律宾没有挑起南海冲突，回应中国有关马尼拉侵犯北京领土的指控。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 预计2024年中国将出现酷暑和更多极端天气
item.description: China - grappling with one of its coldest Decembers on record - will likely have to brace for another round of scorching heat and an increase in extreme weather next year due to the El Nino weather phenomenon, a senior climate expert said.翻译:一位高级气候专家表示，中国正在努力应对有记录以来最冷的12月，明年由于厄尔尼诺天气现象，中国可能不得不迎接另一轮酷暑和极端天气的增加。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 台湾选举前没有看到中国大规模军事活动的迹象
item.description: Taiwan is not seeing any signs of large-scale Chinese military activity before elections next month but is keeping a close watch on China, the island's defence ministry said on Tuesday.翻译:台湾国防部周二表示，在下个月的选举之前，台湾没有看到任何中国大规模军事活动的迹象，但正在密切关注中国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国警告火箭弹残骸将袭击南海
item.description: China warned that remnants of a rocket would hit an area in the South China Sea on Tuesday, following the sixth deployment of its most powerful launch vehicle eleven days ago.翻译:中国警告说，继十一天前第六次部署其最强大的运载火箭后，一枚火箭的残余物将于周二击中南海的一个地区。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国将为在印度被捕的vivo员工提供领事协助
item.description: China will provide consular protection and assistance to two Chinese employees of smartphone maker Vivo arrested by Indian authorities and urges India not to discriminate against Chinese companies, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Monday.翻译:外交部发言人周一表示，中方将为印度当局逮捕的智能手机制造商 Vivo 两名中国员工提供领事保护和协助，并敦促印方不要歧视中国企业。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国的圣诞节充满了闪闪发光的装饰和外国影响的担忧
item.description: Giant Christmas trees adorned with lights, tinsel and gift boxes greet shoppers at glittering malls in big Chinese cities, but in many parts of China, extending season's greetings is out of the question.翻译:在中国大城市金光闪闪的商场里，装饰着灯光、金属丝和礼品盒的巨型圣诞树迎接着购物者，但在中国的许多地方，延长节日的问候是不可能的。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国官方媒体：菲律宾在南海的行动“极其危险”
item.description: Chinese state media accused the Philippines on Monday of repeatedly infringing on China's territory in the South China Sea, spreading false information and colluding with extraterritorial forces to cause trouble.翻译:中国官方媒体周一指责菲律宾多次侵犯中国在南海的领土、散布虚假信息并勾结域外势力滋事。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国地震死亡人数上升至149人，一周后仍有两人失踪
item.description: One of China's most powerful earthquakes in recent years straddled the Gansu and Qinghai provinces in an area where many of China's Hui people, a tight-knit ethnic minority, are found.翻译:中国近年来最强烈的地震之一横跨甘肃省和青海省，该地区居住着许多中国回族（一个紧密团结的少数民族）。
item.author: Reuters
